entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -37.1°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
